title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic chocolate chip cookies that are soft and chewy.
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream butter and sugars together.
Add egg and vanilla, mix well.
Stir in flour, baking soda, and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Baked Salmon
description: Healthy baked salmon with lemon and herbs.
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Place salmon on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, and dill.
Bake for 15-20 minutes until cooked through.

title: Chili Con Carne
description: A spicy stew made with ground beef, beans, and chili spices.
steps: Brown ground beef and chopped onion in a pot.
Add chili powder, beans, and tomato sauce.
Simmer for 30 minutes.

title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast topped with syrup.
steps: Mix flour, milk, egg, and baking powder in a bowl.
Melt butter and add to the mixture.
Pour batter onto a hot griddle and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.

title: Mango Smoothie
description: A refreshing smoothie made with fresh mango and yogurt.
steps: Peel and chop the mango.
Blend mango, yogurt, honey, and ice until smooth.

title: Egg Fried Rice
description: Quick fried rice with eggs and vegetables.
steps: Scramble eggs in a pan and set aside.
Sauté peas and chopped green onion in the same pan.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce, mixing well.
Stir in the scrambled eggs before serving.

title: Greek Salad
description: A fresh and healthy salad with tomatoes, cucumber, and feta cheese.
steps: Chop cucumber and tomatoes into bite-sized pieces.
Mix in feta cheese and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil before serving.

title: Caprese Salad
description: A fresh salad made with mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
steps: Slice mozzarella and tomatoes.
Layer mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar before serving.

title: Vegetable Quiche
description: A savory pie filled with vegetables and cheese.
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Whisk eggs and milk together.
Add chopped spinach and grated cheese.
Pour mixture into pie crust and bake for 30-35 minutes.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with rice, ground meat, and spices.
steps: Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F).
Sauté chopped onion and ground beef until browned.
Mix in cooked rice and tomato sauce.
Stuff the mixture into halved bell peppers and bake for 30 minutes.

title: Banana Bread
description: Moist and delicious banana bread perfect for breakfast or snacks.
steps: Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F).
Mash bananas in a bowl.
Mix in melted butter, sugar, and baking soda.
Stir in flour until just combined.
Pour batter into a loaf pan and bake for 50-60 minutes.

title: Oven-Baked Fries
description: Crispy and healthy oven-baked fries seasoned with herbs.
steps: Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
Cut potatoes into wedges and toss with olive oil, salt, and paprika.
Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 30-35 minutes.

title: Shrimp Scampi
description: Garlic shrimp served over pasta with a hint of lemon.
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a skillet, melt butter and add minced garlic.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Toss with cooked spaghetti and lemon juice before serving.

title: Pesto Pasta
description: Pasta tossed in a flavorful basil pesto sauce.
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Toss hot pasta with pesto and olive oil.
Garnish with Parmesan and pine nuts before serving.

title: Tom Yum Soup
description: A hot and sour Thai soup with shrimp and mushrooms.
steps: In a pot, combine water, lemongrass, and bring to a boil.
Add shrimp and mushrooms; cook until shrimp is pink.
Stir in lime juice and chili paste before serving.

title: Beef Stroganoff
description: A creamy beef dish served over egg noodles.
steps: Cook egg noodles according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook onions and mushrooms until soft.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Stir in sour cream and serve over egg noodles.

title: Pineapple Fried Rice
description: Fried rice with pineapple, shrimp, and cashews.
steps: In a pan, sauté shrimp until pink.
Add cooked rice, pineapple, and cashews.
Drizzle with soy sauce and stir-fry for a few minutes.

title: Coconut Rice
description: Fluffy rice cooked with coconut milk for a tropical flavor.
steps: Rinse rice under cold water.
Combine rice, coconut milk, water, and salt in a pot.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is cooked.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Tacos filled with seasoned ground beef and fresh toppings.
steps: Brown ground beef in a skillet.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, diced tomato, and cheese.

title: Quinoa Salad
description: A healthy salad made with quinoa, vegetables, and a lemon dressing.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Chop cucumber and halve cherry tomatoes.
Mix cooked quinoa with vegetables and dress with lemon juice and olive oil.

title: Veggie Stir-Fry
description: A colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add chopped vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Drizzle with soy sauce before serving.

title: Baked Ziti
description: A comforting baked pasta dish with cheese and marinara sauce.
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cook ziti according to package instructions.
Mix cooked ziti with marinara sauce and half of the mozzarella.
Pour into a baking dish, top with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan.
Bake for 25-30 minutes.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with creamy sauce and pancetta.
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy.
Whisk together eggs and Parmesan.
Toss hot spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture before serving.

title: Lemon Bars
description: Sweet and tangy lemon bars with a buttery crust.
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix flour, butter, and sugar for the crust and press into a baking dish.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Whisk together eggs, lemon juice, and sugar for the filling.
Pour over the baked crust and bake for another 20 minutes.

title: Ratatouille
description: A classic French dish made with summer vegetables.
steps: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Sauté onion in a pan until translucent.
Add remaining vegetables and cook until tender.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

title: Chicken Curry
description: A rich and spicy chicken curry served with rice.
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Sauté onion until soft.
Add chicken and curry powder, cooking until browned.
Stir in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Cabbage Rolls
description: Cabbage leaves stuffed with ground meat and rice.
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Blanch cabbage leaves in boiling water.
Mix ground beef, cooked rice, and chopped onion.
Stuff leaves with mixture and place in a baking dish.
Pour tomato sauce over and bake for 45 minutes.

title: Pumpkin Soup
description: A creamy and comforting pumpkin soup perfect for fall.
steps: Sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add chopped pumpkin and broth; simmer until pumpkin is tender.
Blend until smooth, then stir in cream before serving.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic chocolate chip cookies that are chewy and delicious.
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
Mix in flour until just combined, then fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice
description: A quick and easy fried rice loaded with colorful vegetables.
steps: In a pan, scramble the eggs and set aside.
In the same pan, stir-fry mixed vegetables until tender.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce, mixing well.
Fold in scrambled eggs and chopped green onions before serving.

title: Chickpea Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with chickpeas and fresh vegetables.
steps: Rinse and drain chickpeas.
Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and onion.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl and drizzle with olive oil.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto cooked with mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
steps: Sauté chopped onion and mushrooms in a pan until soft.
Add Arborio rice and stir for 1-2 minutes.
Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring continuously until absorbed.
Stir in Parmesan cheese before serving.

title: Caprese Skewers
description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.
steps: On skewers, alternate threading cherry tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil leaves.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

title: Teriyaki Chicken
description: Grilled chicken glazed with a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce.
steps: Marinate chicken in teriyaki sauce for 30 minutes.
Grill chicken until cooked through.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and chopped green onions before serving.

title: Apple Crisp
description: A warm dessert made with baked apples and a crumbly topping.
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Slice apples and layer them in a baking dish.
Mix oats, brown sugar, butter, and cinnamon until crumbly.
Spread topping over apples and bake for 30-35 minutes.

title: Sweet Potato Mash
description: Creamy mashed sweet potatoes with butter and spices.
steps: Boil sweet potatoes until soft, then drain.
Mash sweet potatoes with butter, milk, cinnamon, and salt until creamy.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Layers of breaded eggplant baked with marinara sauce and cheese.
steps: Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F).
Slice eggplant and coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry eggplant slices until golden brown.
Layer fried eggplant, marinara sauce, and cheeses in a baking dish.
Bake for 30 minutes until bubbly.

title: Mango Smoothie
description: A refreshing smoothie made with ripe mango and yogurt.
steps: Peel and chop mangoes.
Blend mangoes with yogurt, milk, honey, and ice until smooth.

title: Beet Salad
description: A vibrant salad made with roasted beets, goat cheese, and walnuts.
steps: Roast beets until tender, then slice.
Toss arugula with beets, walnuts, and crumbled goat cheese.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette before serving.

title: Pasta Primavera
description: Pasta tossed with fresh vegetables and a light garlic sauce.
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté chopped garlic and vegetables in olive oil until tender.
Combine pasta with vegetables before serving.

title: Fish Tacos
description: Crispy fish tacos topped with fresh cabbage and avocado.
steps: Fry fish fillets until crispy.
Warm corn tortillas and fill with fish, shredded cabbage, and sliced avocado.
Squeeze lime juice over the tacos before serving.

title: Brownies
description: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownies topped with walnuts.
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Melt butter and mix with sugar and cocoa powder.
Stir in eggs until well combined.
Fold in chopped walnuts and pour into a baking dish.
Bake for 20-25 minutes.

title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup and fresh fruit.
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and a pinch of salt.
In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Pour batter onto a hot griddle and cook until bubbles form, then flip.
